title: FS or Trade:  Red Ames PSA 4.5 EPDG Centered--Price Drop!
author: GregMitch34

posts.post_title: FS or Trade:  Red Ames PSA 4.5 EPDG Centered--Price Drop!
posts.post_content:
PSA pop report has it at top with just a 1.5 and 4Q below. SGC has just two higher, both 5s. Back is terrific. Will listen to offers. Possibly might trade.  Goodwin this week confirmed, expanded, surge in semi-rare back prices.

[url]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=101889&stc=1&d=1370524579[/url]
Bump for price cut to $229.95 delivered.
see above for nice price cut tonight--and as noted previously, a trade a possibility.
